程序包 freemarker.ext.xml

Deprecated, use W3C DOM with freemarker.ext.dom instead; Exposes XML from DOM, dom4j or JDOM nodes, uniformly.

    Use NodeModel instead.

程序包freemarker.ext.xml的说明

Deprecated, use W3C DOM with freemarker.ext.dom instead; Exposes XML from DOM, dom4j or JDOM nodes, uniformly.
